items.description: An object representing the scheduling information for one AK

ak_id.description: The unique identifier of the scheduled AK

room_id.description: The unique identifier of the room the AK takes place in

timeslot_ids.description: The unique identifiers of all timeslots the AK takes place in

items.description: The unique identifier of the referenced timeslot

participant_ids.description: The unique identifiers of all participants assigned to the AK

items.description: The unique identifier of the referenced participant
